column1: Daily 2-d atmosphere data (longitude, latitude, time:day) instantaneous preferred over daily-mean (daily-mean = mean over 24 hours)

column10: Notes
surface pressure (not mean sea-level pressure), 2-D field to calculate the 3-D pressure field from hybrid coordinates
Zonal wind on the 10 hPa surface
Zonal wind on the 100 hPa surface
Zonal wind on the 500 hPa surface
Zonal wind on the 850 hPa surface
Zonal wind on the 1000 hPa surface
Meridional wind on the 10 hPa surface
Meridional wind on the 50 hPa surface
Meridional wind on the 100 hPa surface
Meridional wind on the 500 hPa surface
Meridional wind on the 1000 hPa surface
Upward wind on the 50 hPa surface
Temperature on the 5 hPa surface
Temperature on the 10 hPa surface
Temperature on the 30 hPa surface
Temperature on the 40 hPa surface
Temperature on the 50 hPa surface
Temperature on the 70 hPa surface
Temperature on the 100 hPa surface
Temperature on the 1000 hPa surface
near-surface (usually, 2 meter) air temperature
skin temperature - i.e SST for open ocean
Geopotential height on the 10 hPa surface
Geopotential height on the 100 hPa surface
geopotential height on the 500 hPa surface
Geopotential height on the 1000 hPa surface
potential vorticity at 840 K
potential vorticity at 480 K
total ozone column in DU
surface solar irradiance for UV calculations
surface solar irradiance clear sky for UV calculations
outgoing longwave irradiance
snow depth

Compute as the mass of surface snow on the land portion of the grid cell divided by the land area in the grid cell; report 0.0 where the land fraction is 0; exclude snow on vegetation canopy or on sea ice.
minimum near-surface (usually, 2 meter) air temperature (add cell_method attribute time: min)
maximum near-surface (usually, 2 meter) air temperature (add cell_method attribute time: max)
Only required for the first day 00:00 UTC of each month. The tropopause follows the WMO definition and should be consistent with the the tropopause definition used for tpo3chm and lso3chm.

column2: co_25 Mass Mixing Ratio in Surface Layer
column10: daily mean or instantaneous? emitted as anthropogenic CO (emission file available from HTAP, ftp://ftp.retro.enes.org/pub/emissions/aggregated/anthro/0.5x0.5/2000/RETRO_ANTHRO_V2_2000_CO_aggregated.nc but only use annual mean), uniform fixed 25-day exponential decay.

column2: so2t Mass Mixing Ratio in Surface Layer
column10: daily mean or instantaneous? emitted as anthropogenic year 2000 SO2 (as specified in REF-C1, wet removal as SO2.

column2: Aerosol Nitrate Mass Mixing Ratio in the Lowest Model Layer
column10: NO3 aerosol

column2: Aerosol Sulfate Mass Mixing Ratio in the Lowest Model Layer
column10: SO4

column2: Aerosol Ammonium Mass Mixing Ratio in the Lowest Model Layer
column10: Aerosol NH4

column2: BC Mass Mixing Ratio in the Lowest Model Layer
column10: BC

column2: POM Mass Mixing Ratio in the Lowest Model Layer
column10: POM

column2: SOA Mass Mixing Ratio in the Lowest Model Layer
column10: SOA

column2: Sea Salt Mass Mixing Ratio in Lowest Model Layer
column10: seasalt

column2: Dust Aerosol Mass Mixing Ratio in Lowest Model Layer
column10: dust

column2: Aerosol Water Mass Mixing Ratio in Lowest Model Layer
column10: aerosol water

column2: Ozone Volume Mixing Ratio in Lowest Model Layer

column10: at surface; includes both liquid and solid phases from all types of clouds (both large-scale and convective)
This is the in-cloud optical depth obtained by considering only the cloudy portion of the grid cell.
For the whole atmospheric column, as seen from the surface or the top of the atmosphere.  Include both large-scale and convective cloud.

column2: co_50_ea Volume Mixing Ratio at 700 hPa
column10: daily mean, emitted as anthropogenic CO over East Asia (15N-50N; 95E-160E),  (emission file available from HTAP), uniform fixed 50-day exponential decay.

column2: co_50_na Volume Mixing Ratio at 700 hPa
column10: daily mean, emitted as anthropogenic CO over North America (15N-55N; 60W-125W) (emission file available from HTAP), uniform fixed 50-day exponential decay.

column2: co_50_eu Volume Mixing Ratio at 700 hPa
column10: daily mean, emitted as anthropogenic CO over Europe (25N-65N; 10W-50E) (emission file available from HTAP), uniform fixed 50-day exponential decay.

column2: co_50_sa Volume Mixing Ratio at 700 hPa
column10: daily mean, emitted as anthropogenic CO over South Asia (5N-35N; 50E-95E) (emission file available from HTAP), uniform fixed 50-day exponential decay.
fraction of grid cell covered by sea ice.
